snippet: MICKLE--Stuart Harding, aged 58, died May 11, 2016 after a long illness. Son of Perry Morgan Mickle and the late Peter Mickle, Stuart is survived by his mother and his brother, Peter Wilson Mickle. Funeral services private. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MICKLE--Stuart Harding, aged 58, died May 11, 2016 after a long illness. Son of Perry Morgan Mickle and the late Peter Mickle, Stuart is survived by his mother and his brother, Peter Wilson Mickle. Funeral services private. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MICKLE, STUART HARDING
